content.title: Krishonnati Yojana - Sub Mission On Seed And Planting Material (SMSP)
content.details: The scheme aims to strengthen seed quality control, enhance seed production, and promote the use of improved seed varieties through various interventions and financial assistance.
benefits: Financial assistance for seed testing laboratories
Training and workshops for seed-related activities
Support for research and development in seed technology
eligibility: Organizations involved in seed research and training
content.application_process: Online application through the official scheme website.

faqs.question: What is the main objective of the Krishonnati Yojana?
faqs.answer: The main objective is to strengthen seed quality control and enhance seed production through various financial assistance programs.

faqs.question: Who can apply for the scheme?
faqs.answer: Farmers, seed certification agencies, and organizations involved in seed research and training can apply.
